restaurantInfo.name: The Hippodrome Casino: Magic Mike Live

descriptions.mainDescription: The Hippodrome Casino proudly presents Magic Mike Live, the ultimate adult show for a perfect girls’ night out. Packed with temperature-raising acts from thrilling acrobatics, dancing routines, musical talents, but above it all, performed by the most tempting guys in London. Indulge in the thrilling atmosphere with drinks available throughout the show.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: Featuring some of the wildest talented guys performing electrifying dance routines certain to make you blush. Directed and conceived by Channing Tatum, Magic Mike Live is a unique, fun night of provocative, 360-degree show based on the hit movies. There’s simply no other casino in the UK with this level of live entertainment to make your night out complete.
